column1: The House of the Swallow was one of the Twelve Houses of the Gondolindrim
column2: mentioned in the Fall of Gondolin as being under Duilin of Gondolin.  It was a house of archers
column3: who wore a fan of feathers upon their helms
column4: and they were arrayed in white and dark blue and in purple and black.  Their emblem
column6: was that of an arrowhead.  During the Fall they stood upon the walls of the Gondolin
column7: and many were thrust to doom when the enemy came from behind after passing through the North Gate of Gondolin.
